About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hello! I'm Reza Darooei, a PhD student in Biomedical Engineering at Isfahan University of Medical Sciences, and the director of the Game and Treatment Lab. I specialize in game development, signal processing, pattern recognition, and machine learning — passionate about blending technology with healthcare to create impactful interactive experiences.

With strong skills in Unity and Unreal Engine, I develop engaging applications aimed at improving therapy and research. My background in deep learning and signal processing enables me to craft intelligent, adaptive systems tailored to user needs.

You can check out my latest research and publications on my Google Scholar profile. I’m always eager to learn, take on new challenges, and share knowledge to ensure creative visions are realized in the best way.

Feel free to visit my Work section to see my projects, or contact me anytime for questions or collaborations.
